feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Email(Email) :m Base(Base) :o Keys(Keys) :o Encrypt(Encrypt) :o AutoResponder(AutoResponder) :o Addressbook(Addressbook) :o Sign(Sign) :o Forward(Forward) :o Verify(Verify) :o Decrypt(Decrypt)
feature_model.constraints: C1:~Encrypt or Keys C2:~Sign or Keys
